EmailTemplate.description: An email notification is sent to Contact when a new Case is created
EmailTemplate.name: Auto response email when Case is created
EmailTemplate.subject: Case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been created.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been created on your {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}. Confirmation mail will be sent when it is fixed.
For details check the Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
Regards, Covetrus Team
